name: aurelia-sailsjs-boilerplate
description: Example boilerplate application for Aurelia + Sails.js with separated backend and frontend.

scripts.install: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start: (cd backend && npm start) & (cd frontend && npm start)
scripts.patch: git submodule foreach gulp patch && gulp patch
scripts.minor: git submodule foreach gulp minor && gulp minor
scripts.major: git submodule foreach gulp major && gulp major
scripts.push: git submodule foreach git push && git push git submodule foreach git push --tags && git push --tags

author: Ben Teichman
